Dumb ass.  When I did go to a school, I was the most popular person there. =
 And I really don't hate you, I just dislike you.  Sorry, I tend to use the=
 word hate for people I just dislike.  Now, having a hit list and hating pe=
ople wouldn't be very Christian like, would it?  God bless you, and piece o=
ut!  End of discussion hehe, don't reply!
